definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: A gun shot suddenly pealed forth and shot its flames into the air.
sentences.chinese: 突然一声炮响，一道火光升上天空。

sentences.english: The thought fluttered in her mind like a flame-attracted moth .
sentences.chinese: 这想法有如被火光吸引的飞蛾在她心里扑腾着。

sentences.english: The fadeout follows closely the pattern of the solar flare, being observed at the same time as the flare.
sentences.chinese: 淡出严密仿效日晕的形式，被观察在火光的同时。

sentences.english: Firelight shadows began to shimmer and dance around the room.
sentences.chinese: 火光的影子开始在屋里跳跃舞动。
而她的眼中却闪烁着愤怒的火光。

sentences.english: By( such powerful preposition) her deep inhale, the little firelight got flickering.
sentences.chinese: 深吸着，让那小火光闪了闪。

sentences.english: The sky of south china was lightened up.
sentences.chinese: 火光映红了南中国的天空。

sentences.english: Darkness had come, and the glow of conflagrations showed all the more distinctly in two places.
sentences.chinese: 天渐渐黑了，两地的火光显得更加明亮。
你知道关于火光的故事吗？

sentences.english: A pathetic fire flickered in the hearth.
sentences.chinese: 壁炉里微弱的火光在闪烁。

sentences.english: In reality, theAir Force is just trying to take some good pictures with its StarfireOptical Range.
sentences.chinese: 在现实中，空军只是想给星火光范围拍些更好的照片。

sentences.english: The raging flames lit up the whole district.
sentences.chinese: 熊熊的火光照亮了整个的居民区。

sentences.english: The firelight ahead of them gradually grew brighter. They had arrived at a gigantic crevice.
sentences.chinese: 前面火光渐渐明亮，他们已走到一个巨大的裂缝口。

sentences.english: The lights of their lanterns and torches could be seen through the latticed windows.
sentences.chinese: 灯笼火把的火光从窗格中照进来。

sentences.english: I'm gonna make it to heaven, Light up the sky like a flame fame.
sentences.chinese: 我要在天堂舞蹈，火光照亮天际名扬四海。

definition: light/beam of light/gleam of light/light reflected from an object
silvery light/bright white light/shining white light
to flicker/to flash on and off/to brighten and fade
